Samay par vasuli karein, hisab lagayein, aur business me cash flow badhayein

Mere customers mujhe poochhte the ki, kya wo mujhe online payment kar sakte hain? Deri se payment aur fees lagu hone ke karan main QR ka istemaal nahi karta tha. Lekin ab main OkCredit QR phone par dikhata hoon aur mujhe saare payment ke updates ek hi jagah mere khate me mil jate hain.

Main apne grahakon ko udhaar deta hoon, lekin lockdown ke karan bakaya wapas karne ke liye wo mere dukaan par aana nahi chahte the. Lekin ab main unhe payment link bhejta hoon aur wo mujhe unke pasandida madhyam se online payment karte hain. Ab main bahut teji se mere bakaye ki vasuli kar sakta hoon.

Main apne customers ko home delivery deta hoon. Woh mujhe message bhej kar dawaiyan order karte hain aur main unhe QR code bhejta hoon, uske baad woh mujhe online payment karte hain. Unhe bharosa hai ki, mujhe mera paisa mil jayega aur paison ko lekar koi galat fahmi ya pareshani bhi nahi hogi.

Hum pehle sirf nakad len-den karte the. Lekin jab se hum ne online payment lena shuru kiya hai tab se humaara sales aur bharosemand customer donon badh gaye hain. Aur customers bhi jaldi se bakaya chukate hain.
Sujhayi gayi vasuli ki tarikh par aapke customer ko SMS reminder bheja jayega.
